content: As you enter the Fright Cliff proper, another Pitstone enemy waits up the path, with a Blazebone enemy on a ledge to the right to try and pepper you with projectiles.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
As you enter the Fright Cliff proper, another Pitstone enemy waits up the path, with a Blazebone enemy on a ledge to the right to try and pepper you with projectiles.
